P

Person - Class in com.nickeson.games.cardgames
Title: Person.java

Project: Blackjack

Description: A class to model a Person for game play

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

Person() - Constructor for class com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Person
default no-arg constructor warns against creating a null Person
Person(String, String) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Person
minimal constructor requires first & last name
Person(String, String, int) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Person
convenience constructor allows first and last name & age fields to be set upon instantiation
Person(String, String, int, String) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Person
convenience constructor allows first & last names, age and genderIdentity fields to be set upon instantiation
Person(String, String, int, String, List<String>) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Person
convenience constructor allows all Person fields to be set upon instantiation
Player - Class in com.nickeson.games.cardgames
Title: Player.java

Project: Blackjack

Description: A subclass of Person for use in game play

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

Player() - Constructor for class com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Player
default no-arg constructor calls the super constructor which then reminds user that a minimum of firstName, lastName is required to instantiate a Person (or Player, in this case)
Player(String, String) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Player
constructor requires first and last names at minimum upon instantiation of Player
Player(String, String, int) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Player
constructor allows first and last name fields and age to be set upon instantiation of Player
Player(String, String, int, String) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Player
constructor allows all Person fields to be set upon instantiation of Player
Player(String, String, int, String, List<String>) - Constructor for class com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Player
constructor allows all Person fields to be set upon instantiation of Player
playHand() - Method in class com.nickeson.games.cardgames.Dealer
play the Dealer's hand of 21 (specific rules for game_of_21)
